name: Shoes-set BOX - Ceccotti Collezioni
description: The Shoes-set Box is crafted from American walnut veneered poplar plywood, with internal surfaces in Lebanese cedar, divided into various compartments for optimal organization of shoe cleaning accessories. Part of a collection that emphasizes luxury artisan craftsmanship, the Shoes-set Box embodies Ceccotti Collezioni's signature quality in materials such as wood, leather, and metals.
